Sentencas: This work focuses on the effect of acid and alkali pretreatment of palm mesocarp fibre (PMF) on its fuel performance in a direct carbon fuel cell (DCFC).
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: PMF is pretreated with acid and alkali in the range of 0.1 M-4 M and followed by pyrolysis to produce biochar fuel.
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: Performance is evaluated in the DCFC at 750 degrees C, 800 degrees C, and 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: This work reveals that 2.0M HCl treated PMF biochar gives the lowest ash value (0.1 wt%) and the highest O/C ratio among all tested biochars.
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The acid pretreatment contributes to enhanced electrochemical reactivity of the PMF biochar, which gives a peak power density output of 11.8 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C in the DCFC.
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: This obtained peak power density is higher than the power density of untreated biochar, recorded at a value of 0.70 mW cm(-2).
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells

Sentencas: The results indicate that reduced ash, the existence of oxygen functional groups, and porous fibrous structure have increased the electro-oxidation active sites of the pretreated biochar fuel in DCFC.
Titulo: Pretreated mesocarp fibre biochars as carbon fuel for direct carbon fuel cells
